original_title: The Very Best of Glow Vol 1
overview: It has been 20 years since the Gorgeous Ladies of Wrestling burst onto the scene and quickly became one of America's most beloved television programs!  GLOW earned a place in the hearts of viewers all across the country. Now, by opular demand THE VERY BEST OF GLOW features the most sought after episodes of the '80s camp classis
title: The Very Best of Glow Vol 1
